attributes.action: Correct the Gross Discrepancy in Council Tax contributions between Kingston Upon Thames and it's Neighbours
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Kingston pays a lot more of its council tax back to the Government than its immediate neighbour Richmond, despite the large discrepancies in the salaries between the two places.

Give Kingston Council back its fair share of tax, and stop stealing from the poor.
